title: Digital Technology-Enhanced Indigenous Language and Literacy Empowerment Project

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts, basic smartphone usage skills
context.additional_context: A project solving real-life problems by combining indigenous language literacy and math literacy using digital tools in a limited-technology environment (smartphone-centric)

learning_goals: Learners can solve five or more indigenous language-based math problems using smartphone apps and online tools.
Learners can complete one math project linked to indigenous cultural elements using digital collaboration platforms.
Learners can write a 3-minute reflective journal based on integrated language-math learning experiences.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
